text: The CSSStyleSheet.insertRule method on the Batik implementation dosent do anything. I have traced the reason to CSSDocumentHandler.parserRule which is called it creates a new CSSDocumentHandler with the append parameter being false where it should be true for this case.
creator: richard.zschech@cqrdata.com

text:
The Batik CSS module rewrite is underway. The current CSS DOM implementation 
will be removed and re-implemented on the top of a new CSS engine more 
suitable for dynamic updates management.
creator: hillion@apache.org
